tns:patch.author: Viorel Chihai
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_tertiary_programs_level_0 CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_tertiary_programs_level_0 AS SELECT afp.id AS pledge_id, v.name, COALESCE(v.amp_program_id, -999999999) AS amp_program_id, v.percentage, COALESCE(v.cnt_nulls, 0) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges afp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT afpp.pledge_id, COALESCE(level.name, '#') AS name, apl.id0 AS amp_program_id, sum(afpp.program_percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(afpp.program_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges_program afpp JOIN ni_all_programs_with_levels apl ON afpp.amp_program_id = apl.amp_theme_id JOIN all_programs_with_levels oapl ON afpp.amp_program_id = oapl.amp_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme level ON level.amp_theme_id = apl.id0 WHERE oapl.program_setting_name = 'Tertiary Program' GROUP BY afpp.pledge_id, apl.id0, level.amp_theme_id ) v ON afp.id = v.pledge_id;
